channel.title: Soul Time
channel.description:
Soul Time has been on air since September 1984, and is the longest running soul show in the world. It is produced and hosted by Vince Peach.

Soul Time plays a mixture of Northern soul, Motown and related styles, from the sixties to the modern day.

Original R&B, southern grooves and funk are also featured on Soul Time as well as a weekly gig guide of whats on in Melbourne and the rest of Australia

vince.peach@yahoo.com

item.title: Coming Back Strong with Richard Ewart
item.author: Vince Peach

item.title: It's Stuckey Time on Soul Time
item.description:
Here's the playlist:
